entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:12 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -19.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -22.2°C
Wind: SSW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
